summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1195, for the improvement of East Union Street, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-third Avenue; Twenty-seventh Avenue, from the north line of Yesler Estate Addition to East Union Street; Twenty-eighth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Union Street; Twenty-ninth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Union Street; Thirtieth Avenue, from East Terrace Street to East Union Street; Thirty-first Avenue, from Yesler Way to East Union Street; and Thirty-second Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to East Union Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains of proper dimensions together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for a reasonable water service and fire protection, under Ordinance No. 13195 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
